nodes.text: Mooga was a planet located in the galaxy's Mid Rim that was homeworld of the sentient Moogan species. Controlled by the Commerce Guild during the Clone Wars, the Moogan smuggler Tee Va hailed from this world.
Mooga was first mentioned in "Corruption," the fifth episode of the canon animated series Star Wars: The Clone Wars' third season, which first aired on October 8, 2010.
